A online virtual world where you can cre: ¡Un mundo virtual en línea donde puedes crear tu propio avatar, hacer amigos, chatear, crear salas y mucho más!

Here at :hotel we have added a referral: Aquí en :hotel hemos agregado un sistema de referencia, lo que le permite obtener una bonificación por cada :needed usuario que se registre a través de su enlace de referencia y le permitirá reclamar una recompensa de :amount diamantes.
Boosting referrals by making own account: Impulsar las referencias al crear cuentas propias conducirá a la eliminación de todo el progreso, la moneda, el inventario y un posible baneo.
You need to refer :needed more users, be: Necesitas referir :needed usuarios mas para reclamar tu recompensa
Here at :hotel Hotel we are accepting do: Aquí en :hotel Hotel estamos aceptando donaciones para mantener el hotel en funcionamiento, además como agradecimiento recibirás artículos del juego.
Why are donations important?: Por qué son importantes las donaciones?
Donations are important, as it will help: Las donaciones son importantes, ya que ayudarán a pagar nuestras facturas mensuales necesarias para mantener el hotel en funcionamiento, además de agregar funciones nuevas y emocionantes para que usted y otros disfruten!
To purchase items from the :hotel shop,: Para comprar artículos de la tienda de :hotel, visite nuestro Discord y comuníquese con el propietario de :hotel Hotel para realizar su compra
Make sure to use an email that you remem: Asegúrese de usar un correo electrónico que recuerde, este se le solicitará si alguna vez pierde su contraseña.

Enter a new secure password. Do not forg: Ingresa una nueva contraseña segura. No olvides guardarlo en un lugar seguro
Please confirm your new password: Por favor, confirme su nueva contraseña
Your username is what you will have to u: Su nombre de usuario es lo que tendrá que usar cuando inicie sesión en :hotel. También es como otros usuarios te conocerán, ¡así que asegúrate de seleccionar un nombre de usuario que te guste!
You will need your email if you were to: Necesitará su correo electrónico si alguna vez olvida su contraseña, así que asegúrese de que sea algo que recuerde.
Your password must contain atleast 8 cha: Su contraseña debe contener al menos 8 caracteres. Asegúrese de utilizar una contraseña única y segura.

Rules and regulations are subject to cha: Rules and regulations are subject to change without notice. As a member of the :hotel community, you hereby agree to and understand the following terms and conditions above. Failure to comply with these rules and regulations will result in the necessary sanctions implemented upon your account. If you have any questions or concerns in regards to The :hotel Way, please do not hesitate to ask a member of the Hotel Staff.
Do not abuse the Call for Help (CFH) sys: Do not abuse the Call for Help (CFH) system; it should be used during emergency purposes only.
Do not advertise other Habbo Retros; hot: Do not advertise other Habbo Retros; hotel links or purposely mentioning the name of another hotel with the intentions of advertising is not permitted.
Do not attempt to or scam credits or fur: Do not attempt to or scam credits or furniture from other users through betting, gaming, or trading.
Do not bully, harass, or abuse other use: Do not bully, harass, or abuse other users; avoid violent or aggressive behavior.
Do not disclose any personal information: Do not disclose any personal information of another user (e.g., address, IP Address, phone number, school, private images etc.) without their consent.
Do not excessively repeat identical or s: Do not excessively repeat identical or similar statements (spamming).
Users are to not participate in any sexu: Users are to not participate in any sexual, inappropriate, or generally objective acts towards other users without their prior consent.
Do not make rooms with inappropriate or: Do not make rooms with inappropriate or abusive names.
Do not attempt to or successfully harm a: Do not attempt to or successfully harm a user’s home internet connection.
Do not disrupt events with explicit lang: Do not disrupt events with explicit language or negative behavior.
Do not attempt to or give away, buy, sel: Do not attempt to or give away, buy, sell, or trade your
items for virtual items from another gam: items for virtual items from another game, accounts from another game, cash, or vice versa without permission from an Administrator. This includes giving away, buying, selling or trading
furniture/currency for Habbo furniture/c: furniture/currency for Habbo furniture/currency or vice versa.
Do not create a username with an offensi: Do not create a username with an offensive name that is insulting, racist, harassing, or generally objectionable.
Do not evade an IP Address ban.
Do not share your account with other use: Do not share your account with other users.
Do not threaten to, attempt to, or hack: Do not threaten to, attempt to, or hack other users accounts.
Do not create multiple accounts for the: Do not create multiple accounts for the purpose of taking an advantage over gaining more in-game currency and/or rares of any kind.
Do not re-appeal your ban unless stated: Do not re-appeal your ban unless stated otherwise. This means if you re-appeal in 2 days after your first appeal was denied and you were told to re-appeal in 2-3 weeks, you will be banned from the forum as well as the hotel.
Accounts are limited to 2 per person. Th: Accounts are limited to 2 per person. This means, only 1 Alt acc is acceptable. Anything more than this, will result in a full account wipe including credits, and rares.
Do not attempt to or exploit errors of: Do not attempt to or exploit errors of
report it to the Administration immediat: report it to the Administration immediately.
Do not attempt to or refund your VIP Mem: Do not attempt to or refund your VIP Membership or donation to
at any given time; all payments are fina: at any given time; all payments are final.
Do not intentionally give wrong or misle: Do not intentionally give wrong or misleading information to staff members in reports about rule violations, complaints, bug reports, or support requests.
Do not make false statements against: Do not make false statements against
or any other part of its services.
Do not pretend to be a representative of: Do not pretend to be a representative of
This includes mimicing, acting like them: This includes mimicing, acting like them, and or claim to have staff powers.
Do not threaten to, attempt to, or use a: Do not threaten to, attempt to, or use any scripts or third party software to enter, disrupt, or modify
Non-harmful auto-typing, auto-clicking a: Non-harmful auto-typing, auto-clicking and other programs can only be used if you are the room owner or with permission from the room owner.
